reviews.sentence: Sufficient. The room was clean and the pillows were very comfortable. Beware the Sleep Number feature might not be working and you could end up sleeping on a rock. Breakfast is not included which for the price of the room was a letdown.

Not Impressed. Although the staff was attentive and courteous the hotel is very dated. The rate was high for the area due to a State Swim meet we were attending. The air conditioner was Loud. There are no refrigerators in the room unles you ask. When I asked I was too late to get one. We usually stay 20 minutes south of this hotel. We will continue to do so.

convenient to interstate. I would be a little hesitant to recommend this hotel because of the lack of amenities in the room. There was no safe no frig no microwave. It was convenient for me this time because I drove in from the Milwaukee airport. The worst thing I will say is that even though my phone and IPad said wifi was connected we never got service in the entire hotel. We had to go outside for service. Even one of the employees said the service was very poor. That certainly needs to be addressed business can not be conducted outside. The personel were nice and helpful. Wifi servicead a microwave and frig to rooms.

Will have to consider other hotels next time. I have stayed at this hotel many times for swim meets. I was a little disappointed this time. The beds have been changed and are no longer sleep number beds. I found the bed too soft and uncomfortable. They no longer serve coffee in the afternoon. The work out room was closed for floor renovation and I did not find out until I walked down in my workout clothes at 7 am Very disappointing as it was too cold to run outside.
Girls Shopping Weekend. Sleep number beds were capped so we could not adjust them. Went to the pool had no towels. Staff was friendly. Hotel was next to the Pleasant Prairie Outlet.
Would choose this place if I came back to this area again. It was nice having a resturant there. The staff was so helpfulcanot think of anything.
Kenosha Radison experience. The hotel staff was owesome however the room just smelled like an old hotel which needs a total makeover. Carpet has a old stench to it.
Pleasant. Rooms were dated carpeting needed cleaning or replacement. Could have gotten rid of wallpaper.

do not stay until remodel has been completed. Staff was very nice. The restaurant was decent. The hotel was in the middle of a remodel and there was construction everywhere. One of the 2 elevators was down so the wait was long at times. The hot water in the shower took forever to warm up. It was ice cold but finally came on after about 5 mins. This hotel was rated 4 stars but I would give it 25. At least until the remodel is completed. I would give it another shot but only after remodel.

A Ho Hum Property. Front desk staff were quite friendly. The room was a bit pricey and did not include breakfast. The maid did not make up our room on the second day of our stay no reason why and the breakfast in the restaurant was also very pricey and not very tasty. We will likely find an alternative hotel on our next visit.
amazing and very nice hotel to stay.

Every employee we encountered provided us with an excellent experience. Would like to recognize Bambi for her over the top excellent customer service. This hotel was beautiful super clean quiet and the staff was one of the best we have ever encountered. We will definitely return for next years Renaissance Faire.
What a great place to stay. We had a great time at the double tree. What a great place staff everyone from top to bottom were so great We will be back again.
The remodeling looked beautiful. And the Christmas decor was very festive.

I was at the hotel for a memorial service and was very pleased. Greeted by Janele at check in with a friendly smile and free breakfast and drink tickets. The room was very nice and clean. I would recommend this hotel. Hotel staff very helpful.
The hotel was very clean and the staff was excellent.
Easy access to the outlet mall. Very clean room and the kids loved the pool. We also enjoyed the attached restaurant.

Family weekend trip. Front desk staff were always super friendly and very inviting even when my 6 year old pestered them for cookies every time we came and went. I will most definitely return to this hotel in the future.

Modern hotel and trendy rooms worth staying a night. Modern hotel and rooms. Front desk is on point with excellent customer service which is hard to come across nowadays. It had all the amenities like a pool and 24 hour gym. Delicious restaurant connected to the hotel. Across the street from the hotel there is an Outlet mall which is one of the best outlet mall in Wisconsin and illinois When I booked my hotel room on bokingcom it stated the room had breakfast included. When I checked into the hotel front desk said there was no breakfast included. I checked into my room and diged up my email confirmation for the hotel. The email also stated breakfast included. Showed it to front desk Gail. and she was quick to fix it. Gave me a breakfast coupon. Great customer service on hotel end.
Loved our room. Very neat and clean and really liked having a couch in our room. Will definitely try to stay there again.
